page.title: 06LEISURE IN LAWRENCE WESTON
page.content: There are many facilities for leisure activities in and around this area. The{Robin Cousins Sports Centre}has{ Badminton, Roller Skating, Squash, Trampoline, Judo, and Athletics. In most{Pubs,}there are Skittle Alleys and Dart Boards. Teenagers have 2{ {Youth Clubs.}There is{Horse Riding}at Campbell Farm. There are{Playing {Fields}for everyone to play games they want. In Avonmouth there is a{Bowling {Club}and{Rugby}grounds. Many people use the Shirehampton{Swimming Baths. We sent out a questionaire to the Junior families of Weston Park School. From this we found that the majority of people{watch Television}most of the time, or read, or go for a walk. Most people said their favourite activity was{Swimming}but they only go occasionally. Weston Park Primary School
